00014 namespace BulletHell.Game.Object

00016     public class BulletObj : MoveableObj
00017     {
00018         internal SoundEffect hitEffect; // The soundeffect to play when the bullet collide with a planeObj, is not implemented yet.
00019         internal bool killable, // Can the bullet be killed off
00020             bounceable; // Does the bullet bounce back when it hits the boundaries of the viewport
00021         internal Vector2 direction; // The direction the bullet is advancing
00022 
00023         /* These two properties were added to support Map's multi-bullet as a base */
00024         internal float BulletDensity { get; set; } // How dense, or in another word, how close are the bullets to another 
00025         internal int BulletAmount { get; set; } // How many bullets are projected at once.
00026         internal int BulletInterval { get; set; } // How often bullets are projected
00027 
00028         public BulletObj(Texture2D sprite, float x, float y, float vx, float vy, SoundEffect hitEffect, 
00029             bool killable, bool bounceable, float xDirection, float yDirection)
00030             : base(sprite, x, y, vx, vy)
00031         {
00032             this.hitEffect = hitEffect;
00033             this.killable = killable;
00034             this.bounceable = bounceable;
00035             direction = new Vector2(xDirection, yDirection);
00036         }
00037 
00038 
00039         internal virtual void Update(List<BulletObj> pool, Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00040         {
00041             if (!visibility)
00042                 pool.Remove(this);
00043 
00044             // Advances the bullet. */
00045             move(direction.X, direction.Y, velocity.X, velocity.Y);
00046 
00047             /* Check to see if the bullet has collided with the  left and right boundaries. */
00048             if (bounceable &&
00049                 (position.X > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width - Width || position.X < _GLOBAL.Viewport.X))
00050                 direction.X = -direction.X;
00051             if ((position.Y > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height + Height || position.Y < _GLOBAL.Viewport.Y - Height
00052                 || position.X > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width + Width || position.X < _GLOBAL.Viewport.X - Width))
00053                 visibility = false;
00054             // if killable, collision detection
00055 
00056             base.Update(gameTime);
00057         }
00058 
00059         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00060         {
00061             base.Draw(gameTime);
00062         }
00063     }
